definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Aegis Combat System (weapons system developed for the US Navy)
pinyin: Zhou4 si1 dun4 Zhan4 dou4 Xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Kratos: You will pay for this Zeus, be certain of that.
sentences.chinese: 你將會爲此付出代價的，宙斯，我保證。

sentences.english: The money collected was used to build a statue of Zeus at the entrance to the stadium .
sentences.chinese: 在體育館入口處，人們用這些罰款建造一尊宙斯像。

sentences.english: As to sacrifice, both he and Zeus delighted most in bulls.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特和宙斯都最喜歡將公牛作爲他們的供品。

sentences.english: Zeus stabs the sky with thunderbolts.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯用雷電刺穿了天空。

sentences.english: Any of the three one-eyed Titans who forged thunderbolts for Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 幫助宙斯製造雷電地三個獨眼泰坦神之一。

sentences.english: Lord of Heaven, father of gods, Zeus treats all the Heroes as if they are his rambunctious, rebellious children.
sentences.chinese: 天界之王，衆神之父，宙斯在對待英雄一向視如己出。

sentences.english: Hera, Zeus' wife, and also his sister, was very upset.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉，宙斯的妻子，也是他的姐姐，非常氣憤。

sentences.english: Zeus stood up to shake off the dung pellet, and the eggs were thrown to the ground without his thinking.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯站起身來抖落糞蛋，沒留神把鷹卵也抖掉了。

sentences.english: Zeus, sitting on his throne, saw with alarm how strong man was becoming.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯坐在寶座上看到人類逐漸強大起來，非常驚訝。

sentences.english: I claim Zeus for my father and I killedMedusa.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親是宙斯，我殺死了墨杜薩。

sentences.english: Zeus then gifts him with a resurrected Io.
sentences.chinese: 於是，宙斯還給了他一個復活的艾奧。

sentences.english: But it was only rather grudgingly that Zeus granted mortals the use of fire.
sentences.chinese: 可是宙斯卻是不大樂意允准人們用火的。

sentences.english: Well that's just Zeus, that's just another name for Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 就是宙斯嘛，換了一個名字而已。

sentences.english: But Zens made the liver grow back each night, and every day the vulture ate it .
sentences.chinese: 但是宙斯讓他的肝每晚又復原，每天兀鷹都會來啄食。

sentences.english: He is the brother of Zeus and Hades.
sentences.chinese: 他是宙斯和哈迪斯的兄弟。

sentences.english: Thetis was a sea nymph, whose beauty captured the heart of Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 海上女神忒提斯，她的美麗吸引了宙斯的心。

definition: Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
Gaea, the Earth Goddess and mother of the Titans
